triples.name: Large language model
triples.relevance: LLMs are the core technology used by the paper's intelligent agents to interpret and process production system information.

triples.name: Digital twin
triples.relevance: Digital twins form the virtual representation of the physical production system and store control interfaces and descriptive information.

triples.name: Automation
triples.relevance: Automation is the foundational principle for controlling production processes through fine-grained functionalities and coarse-grained skills.

triples.name: Manufacturing
triples.relevance: Manufacturing processes are the target domain that the system orchestrates and controls through LLM-agents.

triples.name: Smart manufacturing
triples.relevance: Smart factories and smart manufacturing concepts are the motivation and context for integrating LLMs into production systems.

triples.name: Intelligent agent
triples.relevance: The paper proposes LLM-agents as intelligent agents that autonomously plan and control production processes.

triples.name: Computer-aided process planning
triples.relevance: The paper proposes an LLM-based approach to automated process planning and execution for production systems.
